text.name: longdescription
text.text: Successor to the Wii and the first eighth-gen video game console, as it competed with Microsoft's Xbox One and Sony's PS4. CPU 1.24 GHz Tri-Core IBM PowerPC "Espresso", 2GB DDR3, Flash Mem 2GB, SD/SDHC/USB, Graph 550MHz AMD Radeon "Latte", Cam 1.3Mpx, TouchPad, Wi-Fi/BT. Release date NA 18 Nov '12, EU 30 Nov '12, JP 8 Dec '12.
